channel.title: go on Matt White
channel.description: Recent content in go on Matt White

item.title: GopherCon 2020
item.description: Last year, I had the privilege of attending GopherCon 2020. Recently, the GopherCon team published the presentation recordings on YouTube. In this post I’d like to take the opportunity to share my favorites! Go is Boring… And That’s Fantastic! One of my favorite summaries of Go and the motivation behind its simplicity! Coming to Go from a language like Python, you might be surprised to see the lack of inheritance, classes, etc.

item.title: Hello!
item.description: package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Hey there!") }
